lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: After my son was born I realized how blessed I am to be able to have everything I needed to provide for him. I wanted to be able and help others provide for their families as well and hopefully make their lives easier in a small way.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching English language to immigrant students from around the world.

lender.name: Kethry
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My job is a service sought by wealthy people and I want to remind myself how lucky I am and make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am brought in to someone's home and asked to style and decorate it with luxury furniture, art, accessories, rugs, and linens. I purchase these items from different vendors and have some of the items custom made. I then deliver and place them in my clients home. Many times clients want to undergo construction to add space to their house or they want to remodel rooms to make them nicer. I also oversee this process and oversee the laborers to complete the job.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: We are all part of the global community... and we need to help each other achieve our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a television channel at a university

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: seems like the right to do.
lender.occupational_info: insanely boring

lender.name: Rutha
lender.loan_because: I have witnessed the challenge talented microentrepreneurs face in accessing capital in South America and Africa and KIVA is a great platform to scale up
lender.occupational_info: Studying, inspiring, learning, educationg and changing

lender.name: KEBE
lender.occupational_info: Mr Kebe I am manager of a shop manufacturing (mask, djembe and decorating etc) and sale of African art object kebeart.com site, my shop on ebay. fr (kebeart05) and on other site online sales I have clientes un anywhere in the world I'd like to improve my production well and the quality of my supplies I wish I had credit for developing my business

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people! =]

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: I think this is an awesome way to help. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: County school bus mechanic.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in College

lender.name: Gael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I helped to found an alternative energy with some friends of mine and now after two years of hands-on experience in developing an aquaculture facility i am returning to school for a formal education in Microbiology.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to earn a living and to prove that you don't have to be a part of the huge banking machine to do it!

lender.name: jujuizam
lender.occupational_info: software automation in semiconductor factory

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I want to help people without trying to tell them how they should live their lives. Microfinancing is a wonderful way to not only aid someone in need but empower them.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: it's an empowering way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Geoffrey Speakman
lender.loan_because: Hey, I was a battler once.
lender.occupational_info: retired builder

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is a unique way to help others and learn about other cultures.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute something to entreprenuers who are doing their best to make a living

lender.name: René
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone needs a chance
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library filled with books and computers for students to work on.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to rid poverty and aid different countries at a personal level
lender.occupational_info: helping those who need my help

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: simple retail management

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: My initial loan was a gift from a dear friend. I think Kiva is a GREAT idea!!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.occupational_info: owner and manager of Graphic Design business in Adelaide, South Australia. specialising in corporate ID/branding work with over 20 years international experience

lender.name: The Ps
lender.loan_because: In honor of our cousins from Cambodia we are blessed to call family - Emily and Allie.

lender.name: Eric and Joanna
lender.occupational_info: We are dedicated teachers in the public school system.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a portion of our total company profits to the empowerment of people who believe in themselves and their ability to achieve great things
lender.occupational_info: I plan meetings and conferences for business

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading to at-risk students in grades K-6.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: of Prof. Muhammad Yunus of Grameen Bank.
lender.occupational_info: I work with towns and counties throughout the state who receive funding for housing and community development projects--the majority of which are designed to help low- and moderate-income citizens.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I may be poor in the US, but I'm spoiled compared to most everyone else on this little planet.
Anyone who works hard and strives to be a better person deserves my support if I can lend it.
lender.occupational_info:
I look at cars for banks. Lots and lots of cars.
The bank owns the cars and loans them to dealers. I make sure the cars are where they are supposed to be. I also look at the cars when people have finished leasing them, and then help sell them to new people.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I believe business can be a vehicle for social change

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have it. It is my prayer that one day someone else will be the lender and not the borrower because of my contributions.
lender.occupational_info: I educate children, however that is my service. My work is to praise God and to be a Christian! Be Blessed!!

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: Political

lender.name: misty
lender.occupation: i make baby slings from hom

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to help you create your own happiness
lender.occupational_info: I look at how my company spends and makes money.

lender.name: Barbara & Mario
lender.occupation: Health Education and Disease Prevention Research
lender.loan_because: Kiva's microloaning program is a great way to plant seeds of economic freedom in families around the world
lender.occupational_info: Barbara teaches HIV prevention and Mario works in public health doing research and evaluation of chronic diseases like cancer and heart disease.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because:
I really love how you can choose to whom and where you want your money to go. And when you get your money back, you can help someone else.
Life really doesn't need to be this hard. If we have a choice to help make it a little easier for others, why not do it.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Our generation of hope, pioneered by technologies such as kiva, is enabling individuals from vastly different circumstances to realize their interdependence, to empower one another, and to bond as friends.
lender.occupational_info: I want to suck the marrow out of life. I believe that the better off my fellow neighbor is, the better off I will be. I enjoy life. I have a stake in this world. I am responsible but take no credit.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: members of my Sunday School class told me about the program and it sounded so rewarding. I am also going to have my sons begin to lend money so they can learn the value of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in training and outreach on programs for the elderly and disabled adults and children to help them stay at home and receive care at home.

lender.name: Mona
lender.loan_because: When I saw an ad for Kiva I didn't see how I couldn't give a $25 loan! Now I have been paid back and am giving out the same money again! It's so great that I will be able to help people over and over with the same $25
lender.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant. When somebody comes in to eat I suggest items they might like and help them choose from our very large wine and drink list. Then I relay their order to the kitchen and/or bar who makes the food and drinks. I talk with the tables, make sure they have all they need and also process their credit card or cash before they leave.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I've needed a leg up in my time.
lender.occupational_info: I design commercial and residential fire sprinkler systems to protect life and property.

lender.name: Raghu
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a job

lender.name: Socient
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place and to give the opportunity to everyone to create wealth
lender.occupational_info: We provide marketing platforms for individuals and organizations to promote and share ideas, products, and services.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to help!

lender.name: kara
lender.loan_because: People deserve it.
lender.occupational_info: At my work, I try to be kind, helpful and informative, facilitating people's navigation through the very convoluted world of American health insurance.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am extremely grateful for the opportunities presented to me in life and want to directly and positively impact the world around me by helping to create opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an in-house corporate attorney for a socially-responsible biopharmaceutical company, and, believe it or not, I love my job!

lender.name: Hege&Espen
lender.loan_because: We want to give hard working people around the world a chance to reach their goals!
lender.occupational_info: Hege is employed as an accounting consultant. Espen is an entrepreneur within the computer software business.

lender.name: Rahel
lender.loan_because: ...having spent many years in low-paying jobs, I know the frustrations of poverty, and want to help others who are motivated to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations communicate better with their audiences.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I'm a political science student who hopes to study economic development.

lender.name: Kemmeo and Aaron
lender.loan_because: I can. And as a first generation American (Brazilian family) I've been back and seen poverty first hand and realize how little it takes to make a difference in the third world. We don't have much but we do what we can, because we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer, a daughter, a wife, and a mother.

lender.name: Olina
lender.loan_because: Even if I am not a rich girl, I know more and more people stay poor with heavy burden and strong desire to become economically independent. I hope my little donation will be helpful to others to improve their lives and make a better future for their families and children.
lender.occupational_info: an average office lady

lender.name: Duke
lender.loan_because: simply want to help to alleviate the poor, bring some hopes to others so they can do the same to other's others
lender.occupational_info: Service peoples looking for entertain, relax after long day works.

lender.name: Stephane
lender.loan_because: there is more than beautiful flowers in The Netherlands: people are friendly, open, generous and willing to help other countries. I believe we can help a lot if we understand well the needs of other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to use new computer systems. It seems technical but it is very human: a lot of people are afraid of change and you have to help them in adapting to the new situation: the new system.

lender.name: Ronel
lender.loan_because: I started a pay-roll company in South Africa. There are so many underprivileged people in my beautiful country. They have drive, determination and such wonderful spirits, but not the resources to really get going. I want to try and assist them to build something for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: The pay-roll company is internet based and with very little training a person can do a whole companies completed pay-roll, as you buy software packages that does all the calculations for you. You just need to have the basic background, a computer and internet. With this and as long as people are getting employed a person always have potential customers.

lender.name: Christopher and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve a dream.
lender.occupational_info: Creator of video and written media(s) regarding food, culture and art.

lender.name: Sverre
lender.loan_because: Helping begins where the need is biggest! http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Percentage_population_living_on_less_than_$2_per_day_2009.png
lender.occupational_info: Legal.

lender.name: Ewa
lender.loan_because: sometimes so little means so much for someone else...

lender.name: Santiago
lender.whereabouts: Cdad Autonoma de Buenos Aires Buenos Aires

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: I learned of microfinance during a study abroad trip to Costa Rica with the University of Georgia program. I wanted to see my research in action and to make a difference in the life of a family less fortunate than mine.

lender.name: Yuan-Ming
lender.loan_because: I just want to be a good samaritan!

lender.name: Silke
lender.loan_because: I really appreciate the initiatives of the loan users.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I believe in others and want to help them achieve their hopes of economic betterment.

lender.name: THOMAS
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people take control of their lifes. Human despair is food for political disaster and should be avoided, really!
lender.occupational_info: I am COO for a Swedish company that grows, refines, markets and sells Stevia, a natural calorie free sweetener. We work with small scale farmers in order to get a sustainable production of the highest quality Stevia, while making a difference...

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I help make computer software that helps librarians use their journals

lender.name: Birgit
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching physiotherapy students in theory and practice at a university.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It's a no-brainer. Teach someone to fish...aw, you know the rest.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles about health and medicine.

lender.name: Robert-Antonio
lender.loan_because: ...I consider it as the most efficient way for help to poor countries I've ever seen.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: It's the best kind of charity to help another person gain independence and financial security

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to help where ever I can. I want to do something rather than say something.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the military.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because:
Psalms 112:5 Proverbs 19:17 Luke 6:34+35 1 John 3:17+18
Preferably I chose loans from Kiva's Christian Field Partners: http://www.kivapedia.org/index.php/Christian_Field_Partners
lender.occupational_info: I'm working for Inter-Mission Germany ( www.inter-mission.de ), a Christian missionary society and relief organization operating on an interdenominational and international scale. Mainly I'm responsible for the administration of sponsorships.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: The bureaucracy of large organizations frustrates me. Kiva gets me excited because I can help someone in need and see the direct results of how my money helped.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Member of Parliament for the Government of Canada. I help people with issues they have including immigration, tax, employment insurance and a wide range of other things.

lender.name: Chris Korakas
lender.loan_because: kiva.org makes it so easy to loan small amounts virtually at no risk. Being able to help others making a difference in their daily lives is a very gratifying feeling. I have donated as well. I feel loans can make a biger impact as my limited ressources will be reinvested again and again and potentially benefit many more.
lender.occupational_info: Imagine and create web tools and environments that enable capacity development in government, civil society and private sector.

lender.name: Jimmy & Sandy
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus!
lender.occupational_info: Young Adult Ministry

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the means to do so.

lender.name: lance
lender.loan_because: "you must be the change you want to see in the world" Mahatma Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I want to give back.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I believe in what you do to other people you get back. If you help other people you will receive it back in turn.
lender.occupational_info: All ID is dedicated in provide what customers want - a single source for all of their identification needs: including product, cards, supplies, full service installation, training, network and database services, as well as preventative and emergency on-site maintenance. With factory-trained and certified technicians to provide on site maintenance or depot service with fast turn around on all repairs for you're: ID Card Printers, Card Embossers, Imprinters, Cameras, and Barcode Label Printers All ID has been in business since 1988, our mission is to provide the best of what the customers want.

lender.name: Kevin & Morgan
lender.loan_because: Lup told us to.

lender.name: Guy-Michel
lender.loan_because: I was once a very poor immigrant and God demonstrated His love for me through people's generosity.
lender.occupational_info: I aim to empower people so they could work to their full potentials, realizing their dreams and one day ...hopefully, they will also help others...

lender.name: Giving Back
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurs and their courage ... everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Duncan Goose
lender.loan_because: It's something that we should all do. It's simple, fast and life-changing.
lender.occupational_info: Working with a team of highly passionate and talented individuals united in a common cause to effect sustainable change in developing countries.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: Because I think it is a lot better for people to build businesses and build better lives than to be dependent on aid.
lender.occupational_info: I provide advice to technology companies and their customers. I negotiate outsourcing agreements and software licenses.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a huge difference
lender.occupational_info: Developing financial and volunteer resources for the UC Davis College of Engineering through individual, foundation, and corporate support.

lender.name: Larisa
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chances only some of us get.

lender.name: nodeposit
lender.loan_because: Find a listing of no deposit online casinos. You may ask yourself why and how can online casinos afford to give players free bonus money with no deposit required.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to give back

lender.name: Sabiha
lender.loan_because: I can. And should.

lender.name: André
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the micro-loan system

lender.name: Swetha Balla
lender.loan_because: Life is sacred. Celebrate life. Care for others and share whatever you have with those less fortunate than you.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because:
I'm an older single mum who is grateful to be in a welfare state that permits me to be a devoted and active parent during my son's early years.
The world is smaller than we think, and the only way humanity will survive is if we evolve beyond greed into a greater social consciousness.

lender.name: Paul Stevens
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: Twisting arms, in gentle sort of way.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To help people around the world grow and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Sigurd
lender.occupational_info: Finance student

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: it helps others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves learning new technology and then teaching others how to learn that same technology easily.

lender.name: Common Ground
lender.loan_because: We knew just a little effort on our part might make a big difference for someone else in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We sold eco-friendly dishwasher detergent at our church coffee hour to raise funds (50% borax, 50% washing soda - try it!)

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I hate poverty, and I know how hard it is to get out of it.
lender.occupational_info: I do cancer research and teach.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I believe in catalyzing and supporting a movement of social entrepreneurs and promoting innovative approaches to sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: I support local food and agriculture systems.

lender.name: Anti Veeranna
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: The Nguyen Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I design software for computers.

lender.name: Michael Gallagher
lender.loan_because: Microlending and social media is a good marriage of idea and ability.
lender.occupational_info: I work for JSTOR (www.jstor.org) a large digital library serving the global academic community.

lender.name: Alexandra Aubertin
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in the power and future of micro finance and in the support individuals around the globe can give to each other.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate teams of people with various skills to create products, services or events in a defined amount of time within a defined budget.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I'm not rich, but I have more than so many others. $25 is tips on a bad day. I can live without that.

lender.name: Sharifa
lender.loan_because: I am a seravnt of God and I know what it is like when you don't have the finances and I to need financial help to birth my organizarion. So plant a seed and watch it grow.
lender.occupational_info: The work I am doing is providing a safe haven for troubled youth and young adults.

lender.name: Mad Dog Willy
lender.loan_because: this is the capitalist answer to socialism

lender.name: tim
lender.loan_because: Interested in encouraging entrepreneurship around the world.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and worked in many countries and am thankful for times when others have taken a chance on me. I want to make a difference and be a Godsend in other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a church, managing our buildings, coordinating maintenance and making sure things run smoothly. Helping the built environment meet users' needs is very fulfilling and brings me joy.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Emilly
lender.loan_because: In memory of Dick Adamson, an enthusiastic Kiva lender and beloved friend to many throughout the world.

lender.name: Pedro Ribeiro
lender.loan_because: Microcredit seems to be an ideal way to attack poverty. Get fast whom have little

lender.name: Kinnara
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student, and will be for a while. :)

lender.name: george
lender.loan_because: What seems like such a small sacrifice to me can make a real difference for others.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving people a helping hand...
lender.occupational_info: I teach students about science

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: it feels good!

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: The concept behind Kiva is great. Anyone who has any money that doesn't need to be used for a few months should be doing this! It can sit in a bank earning minimal interest or be in Kiva helping people around the world build better lives for themselves. That's worth more to me then the 0.1% interest any day!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school at a community college, soon to go to a University (probably Central Washington University) to try and gain enough knowledge (and a degree) to enter the work force with a good job in a few years.

lender.name: ulla
lender.loan_because: it does not take much to help.
lender.occupational_info: hi! my job is doing fashionshows in new york and europe and sometimes they take my picture for a fashion magazine.

lender.name: Marta
lender.loan_because: if not me, then who?

lender.name: Irvin MacQuarrie
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people developing countries to pursue a better life through their own businesses.

lender.name: LPlaz
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It lets me give back to the worldwide community in my own small way by helping to make some opportunities available to other people.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I write and perform songs. I'm looking for a job right now and hope I find one soon!

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to use the resources I have been given to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time college student. However, I am able to make money by baby-sitting (providing childcare) for a few families.

lender.name: Arianna
lender.occupation: Project Coordinator for RMMSMSP NSF Grant

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in the power of one to make a difference and when one becomes many there is power in making an even larger impact and that moves me.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference regardless of how small it may be.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a United States Congressman.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an administrative coordinator at an animal rights nonprofit. I love my work and enjoy being around other people who want to make this world better for all beings.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Gene was the best friend I ever had! He always had my back which is the greatest gift you can give anyone! I really miss his passion for life, his enthusiasm and his ability to immediately figure out the important things in life no matter what the challenge. I hope that in my life, as I live it and it plays out, that I will be able to make Gene proud!
lender.occupational_info: I work with small and medium size businesses selling IT product and services to the US Government. I started my own company because I was tired of the large, stuffy, bureaucratic companies who were not really interested in helping to solve their client's issues but just wanted to make a buck no matter what they did!

lender.name: Arnold
lender.loan_because: ...my life is not about me.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to be healthy and fit.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Want to help others in small, personal ways and to teach my little girl the hope and love of sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young teenagers the fun of art.

lender.name: HENAA Lenders
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care. We understand and appreciate that we are more fortunate than many, and that we can do something to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of homeschooling friends from New York (USA). We learn outside of the conventional school model and find that LIFE is often the best teacher of all. What better lesson than that of learning about our fellow human beings around the world and reaching out a hand in unity, and hope for a brighter future.

lender.name: Mara & Stewart
lender.loan_because: We know that we can change the world through simple acts of kindness. We also know that women can do anything given the right resources and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Mara: I help eliminate risk when developing software by following a very precise methodology. Stewart: I run large industrial construction projects, and do most of the electrical work.

lender.name: Ktb
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Clare A was W
lender.loan_because: I think its important we support each other - no matter how far apart we may be physically.

lender.name: Anya
lender.loan_because: I believe in you. Thank you for allowing me to invest in your dreams. I know you will succeed.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I personally understand the difference that investment makes in people's lives. People have invested in me, and I get a good feeling from investing in others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make websites and computers more user-friendly. I draw the pictures of what the screen will look like.

lender.name: SACRENA Orphans and Widows Project-Kenya
lender.loan_because: We want capital to help us get market to our hand made hand and craft.This will help us open market for selling our projects which are African Based and generated through recycling of second used materials such as plastic bags,cloths an d papers.
lender.occupational_info: We make traditional African products to support orphans and help ourselves to get food and other basic needs.through this loan will help us generate income generating activities which will help our fellow members.

lender.name: Frido
lender.loan_because: Hilfe zur Selbsthilfe

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe in the power of a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying Public Affairs at Seattle University.

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I believe we should help eliminate financial burdens and replace it with opportunity around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Manage residential construction projects

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: It feels incredible.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student studying speech and hearing. I want to become a speech therapist and eventually open my own clinic.

lender.name: Brody
lender.loan_because: I believe money is a tool to be shared with those who have set goals to better themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone around the world should have the opportunities that people in my country often take for granted. I don't know how to make that happen, so I try to help in my own small way.
lender.occupational_info: I audition for and occasionally perform in theatre productions around the state. When I'm not performing, I'm usually working at a restaurant to pay my bills.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: it's my responsibility as a human being who is financially able at all, and who on a computer can't make one loan?

lender.name: Ronja Evans-Knaup
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born in the Netherlands.
lender.occupational_info: Drinking milk

lender.name: eloy
lender.loan_because: I can :)

lender.name: Jennifer F.
lender.loan_because: it's nice to help others.

lender.name: Shirley & Joseph
lender.loan_because: It's time to put our money where our hearts are. Also because it's time for webmasters, web hosting managers and web site owners to work toward a powerful union of positive change.
lender.occupational_info: TrueChange.net is a Kiva.org based micro-lending team with the principal goal to encourage and assist webmasters, web site owners, hosting providers and just regular Internet users to participate in the world-wide growth and opportunity creating efforts of micro-lending.

lender.name: etidianughe
lender.loan_because: It encourage organization to move towards their target of achievement
lender.occupational_info: Social

lender.name: Jussi
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help make people's dreams come true.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: People need to help one another.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: One person can make a difference, it just takes that first step. That's it. One step. Then you find you're not alone and others are beside you. I am blessed in my journey.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell their homes faster and for more money by creating environments that potential buyers find comfortable and inviting.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people!
lender.occupational_info: I connect people with information, especially about plants and insects.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: the needs are so great and I believe that even a little bit can make a big difference in someone's life. It is all about the small stuff.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher and most importantly am the mother of 3 grown children. My husband and I have been very blessed. My daughter who lives in Alaska gave me this certificate as a birthday gift. I couldn't have received anything better!

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I use technology and media to help educate young people about the world.

lender.name: Raghav
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info: IT Professional

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can and I like to think I am helping someone build his/her business and a better life in the process.
lender.occupational_info: I sell products and services from China into the United States.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to use part of the money for adverts on national dailies, handbills and some national television stations. I also loan because I want to use the money to burn all my concepts on study free in Europe, live and work in abroad, and how to get a scholarship for further your studies anywhere under heaven into software/CDs and start selling them.
lender.occupational_info: Educational Consultations and Processing of Students Documents to study in Abroad. Getting job offers in abroad and dispersing it to all in Nigeria, and helping them on how to go by it. Selling and Dispersing Information to all.

lender.name: Leely
lender.loan_because:
Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend. Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow. -- Melody Beattie
A thankful heart is not only the greatest virtue, but the parent of all other virtues. -- Cicero

lender.name: Janine
lender.loan_because: Sometimes I think the world has forgotten the most important influencer... mothers.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: tiger burning bright
lender.occupational_info: teaching how to be a goof ball

lender.name: Miri and Matt
lender.loan_because: We feel rich in what we do, how we live and what chances we have in life - mainly because of the support through our parents, but also the simple fact of the countries we were born in. With so little effort Kiva allows us to participate in the life of other people around the world and help them succeed on their way.
lender.occupational_info: We try to find solutions for a new renewable and sustainble energy supply.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship is very important to me.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, researcher,

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: it helps make people's lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I live in New York City and work for a credit card company helping travel company partners grow their businesses.

lender.name: ptsgrad2001
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans provide a direct means of opening up opportunities and I find it very exciting to know a little bit about the person's life who is a visionary and engaged in making their world a better place. I also like being part of a team of donors because it symbolizes that we are not alone on this earth.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising a young child and preparing to be a professor of church history.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Too much time in front of a computer.

lender.name: Cheney
lender.loan_because: My first loan was a gift from friends.
lender.occupational_info: Musician

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We had kings who controlled the grain. then the republic where the rich controlled capital. Now for something completely different.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a bus for a living and do art in my free time. I do mostly stone sculpture.
